General.Name: Omaxe Limited
General.Description: Omaxe Limited engages in the infrastructure and real estate development activities in India. It develops and sells integrated and hi-tech townships, group housing projects, shopping malls, office spaces, SCOs, hotels, and apartment. The company was formerly known as Omaxe Construction Limited and changed its name to Omaxe Limited in June 2006. Omaxe Limited was founded in 1987 and is based in New Delhi, India. Omaxe Limited is a subsidiary of Guild Builders Private Limited.
